General.Name: Fujian Expressway Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Expressway Development Co.,Ltd engages in the investment, construction, development, toll collection, maintenance, and operation and management of expressways in China. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: Fujian Transportation Complex Building, Fuzhou, China, 350001
